name: Save Baikal
description:
You were chosen to demolish very toxic factory near the lake.  You can hire up to 6 worker groups to do different tasks such as: mining, alchemy, recycling and more. Occasionally, some events will happen and you will have to choose what to do. There are a lot of different endings, try to uncover all of them! Playtime till the end is ~1h.

The game is in development. I'll try to finish it as soon as I can)
